About US

Our law firm, Coindet & Associates is a legal firm established in Tegucigalpa, Republic of Honduras, rendering services to our International Clients through our offices with representation in Cyprus, Singapore, United Kingdom, United States of America, including Puerto Rico, Panama and Costa Rica.

Our law firm was established in 1970 by our Senior Partner Mr. GUILLERMO COINDET,(R.I.P) our Corporate Department is engaged in Multi-jurisdiction, Company formation, intellectual property protection, vessel Registration, Classification Societies, P & I Clubs, sea fearers, Consulting and all other related shipping matters. - Our work since the beginning is to provide reliable services and professional advice.

At present we anticipate our client’s needs approaching them in a timely manner, and giving them a continued and effective service at the highest professional and ethical standards.

Additionally for the past twenty year’s attorney and Notary Public Jessica Coindet has been with the firm.

Our Mission

Our Commitment is with you and with this in mind, to serve you responsibly and efficiently beyond our own expectations.
